    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, -0.5, 2.82800007
    def c2, 1.5, 0.00700000022, 0.00350000011, -0.360000014
    def c3, 15, 0.333999991, -0.666000009, 0.666000009
    def c4, 0.333999991, 0, -0.333000004, 0.666000009
    def c5, 4, 0.333330005, -3, 0.0625
    def c6, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 0
    def c15, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0
    def c16, 0.001953125, 0.0078125, 0.064453125, 0
    def c17, 0.5, 1.5, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_165B3D6D_0.txt
texldl r7, c220.z, s15
mov r6, c11 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r6.x, r7.x, c220.w, r6.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    add_pp r0.xy, c1.z, v1
    mul_pp r0.zw, r0.xyxy, r0.xyxy
    mad_pp r0.zw, r0, -c1.w, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.zw, r0, r0
    mad_pp r0.zw, r0, -r0, c1.x
    log r1.x, r0.z
    log r1.y, r0.w
    mul r0.zw, r1.xyxy, c2.x
    exp_pp r1.xz, r0.z
    exp_pp r1.yw, r0.w
    mul_pp r1, -r0.xyxy, r1
    max_pp r2.x, r0_abs.x, r0_abs.y
    add r0.x, r2.x, c2.w
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c3.x
    mad_sat r2, r1.zwxy, -c2.yyzz, v1.xyxy
    mad_sat r1, r1, c2.zzyy, v1.xyxy
    mul r3, r2.zwxx, c1.xxyy
    mul r2, r2.xyxx, c1.xxyy
    texldl_pp r2, r2, s0
    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    mad r4, r0.x, c3.yyzy, c3.w
    mov r5, c4
    mad r0, r0.x, r5.xxyz, r5_abs.wwyz
    mul r3, r3.zzxy, r4.zzww
    mad r2, r2.zzxy, r0.zzyw, r3
    mul r3, r1.xyxx, c1.xxyy
    mul r1, r1.zwxx, c1.xxyy
    texldl_pp r1, r1, s0
    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    mad r2, r3.zzxy, r4, r2
    mad r0, r1.zzxy, r0, r2
    mul r1, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r1, r1, s0
    add_pp r0, r0, r1.zzxy
    max r1.xy, v1.zwzw, c8
    min r2.xy, c8.zwzw, r1
    texld_pp r1, r2, s4
    mul r2, r1.zzxy, c5.x
    mad r0, r0, c5.y, -r2.yyzw
    mad_pp r0, r1.w, r0, r2
    dp3_pp r1.x, r0.zwyw, c6
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, c5.z
    exp_pp r1.x, r1.x
    mul_sat_pp r1.y, r1.x, c0.w
    mul_sat_pp r1.x, r1.x, c13.x
    texld r2, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r2, r2.zzxy, c0.zzxy
    mul_pp r2, r2, c5.x
    mad_pp r0, r2, r1.y, r0
    mov r1.zw, c10
    mad r1.yz, v0.xzww, -r1.xzww, r6.xxyw
    dp2add r1.y, r1.yzzw, r1.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r1.y, r1.y
    rcp r1.y, r1.y
    mul_sat r1.y, r1.y, -c1.z
    mov r1.w, c9.w
    mad r1.z, r1.w, -c17.x, c17.y
    texld_pp r2, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r1.w, r2.w, r2.w
    mul_pp r2, r2.zzxy, c14.zzxy
    mul r2, r1.x, r2
    lrp r3.x, r1.w, r1.z, c9.w
    lrp r4.x, r1.y, c1.x, r3.x
    mul r1.x, c12.x, c12.x
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c12.x
    lrp_pp r3.x, r1.x, c1.x, r4.x
    mul_pp r0, r0, r3.x
    mad_pp r0, r2, c5.x, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c7.y, c7.x
    rcp r2.z, r1.x
    rcp r2.w, r1.y
    rcp r2.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r2
    mul r1.xyw, r0.xwzz, c15.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r1.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, r0.x, c5.w, r1.w
    mad r0.x, r0.y, c3.x, -r0.x
    add r1, r1.xyxy, c16.xyzy
    texld_pp r2, r1.zwzw, s3
    texld_pp r1, r1, s3
    add r2, -r1, r2
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r2, r1
